import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
sns.set_theme(style="whitegrid")

%matplotlib inline
source.bbd2df74:
tmp = data.groupby('Country')['UserName'].count().reset_index().sort_values('UserName',ascending=False)

plt.figure(figsize=(25,5))
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='Country',y='UserName')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title("Grandmaster distribution by country")
plt.show()

source.26e57361:
tmp = data[data['GM_tier_count']>0].groupby('GM_tier_count')['UserName'].count().reset_index().sort_values('UserName',ascending=False)

plt.figure(figsize=(25,5))
sns.barplot(data=tmp,x='GM_tier_count',y='UserName')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.title("Distribution by grandmster title count")
plt.show()
